players.name: Alice
memory: The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Charlie: "Alice is mafia. I investigated her and found her role. Diana was killed by the mafia. I know I'm the detective."
You: "Bob is mafia. He was the one who pointed at Charlie. He knows nothing. I saw him whispering about the kill."
Bob: "Alice is mafia, Charlie is detective."
